mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as prodCount FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND LIST_ID = 'ADM000000001'

SELECT /* DisplayProductMapper.xml, Display_Product.selectDpProd, mhcha123, 2014-01-24 */ (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DP_PROD WHERE PROD_ID =#{prodId}) AS prodCount ,DPTENANT.TENANT_ID AS tenantId ,DPPROD.PROD_ID AS prodId ,DPPROD.TOP_MENU_ID AS topMenuId ,DPTENANT.PROD_STATUS_CD AS prodStatusCd FROM TB_DP_PROD DPPROD, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD DPTENANT WHERE DPPROD.PROD_ID = DPTENANT.PROD_ID AND DPPROD.PROD_ID =#{prodId} AND DPTENANT.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DP_LIST_PROD ( SELECT TP.TENANT_ID , 'ADM000000001' AS LIST_ID , MCP.MENU_ID , P.PROD_ID , TO_DATE( TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS STD_DT , NULL AS EXPO_ORD_ALWAYS_YN -- , (SELECT MAX(EXPO_ORD)+1 FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD WHERE LIST_ID = 'ADM000000001')AS EXPO_ORD , NULL AS EXPO_ORD_SUB -- , 'Y' AS EXPO_YN , NULL AS ETC_CLSF_CD , NULL AS ETC_CD -- 변경 , NULL AS PRCHS_QTY , NULL AS PRCHS_AMT , NULL AS DWLD_QTY , TO_DATE( TO_CHAR(P.REG_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') AS EXPO_START_DT , TO_DATE( '99991231','YYYYMMDD') AS EXPO_END_DT , NULL AS IMG_PATH -- , P.REG_ID , TO_DATE( TO_CHAR(P.REG_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYYMMDD') AS REG_DT , P.UPD_ID , TO_DATE( TO_CHAR(P.UPD_DT,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS UPD_DT FROM TB_DP_PROD P, TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP, TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG MCP WHERE MCP.USE_YN = 'Y' AND P.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND P.PROD_ID = MCP.PROD_ID AND P.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} )
mapper.select: SELECT /* DisplayProductMapper.xml, Display_Product.selectMemberInfo, mhcha123, 2014-01-24 */ T1.INSD_SELLERMBR_NO AS "mbrNo" , T1.SELLERMBR_ID AS "mbrId" FROM TB_US_SELLERMBR T1 WHERE T1.INSD_SELLERMBR_NO = #{mbrNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* DisplayProductMapper.xml, Display_Product.deleteAdminRecommand, mhcha123, 2014-01-24 */ FROM TB_DP_LIST_PROD WHERE TENANT_ID =#{tenantId} AND PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND LIST_ID IN ('ADM000000012','ADM000000013')
mapper.update: INSERT /** DisplayProductMapper.xml, Display_Product.insertWhiteList, mhcha123, 2014-01-24 */ INTO TB_PD_MOSPA_JOIN_PROD ( PROD_ID ,SUB_CONTENTS_ID ,VERIFY_VER_SEQ ,REG_CLSF ,DEPLOY_YN ,DEPLOY_FAIL_CNT ,REG_DT ) SELECT SC.PROD_ID , SC.SUB_CONTENTS_ID , ( SELECT (NVL(MAX(VERIFY_VER_SEQ), 0) + 1) AS SEQ FROM TB_PD_MOSPA_JOIN_PROD WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId} ) , 'A' , 'N' , 0 , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') FROM TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC WHERE SC.PROD_ID = #{prodId}
